name: Ahoy, me hearties!
description:
Ahoy, me hearties!

You be sailin' the seven seas, to clech your thirst for Rum!

To advance in each level, you must gather 150 bottles of Rum, to have enough for your next endeavors.

You must work together to overcome the challenges of the deck:

- You must help chef finding his ingredients.

- Load the right canonballs.

- Escape the frenzied mutineer hrough the cabins of the ship.

- Use the canon to fight back the hoarding intruders of our precious ship.
